subject: Re: How do I set the testcase name dynamically with using junit4?
msgSnippet: ... That s good to know, also I see some great guys have already posted their patch for that. So can I assume that this feature will be supported in the next
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, David Saff <david@...> wrote:
>
> Tao,
>
> There's nothing good for this right now. However, better naming of
> Parameterized tests is very high in the feature-request voting right
> now (http://github.com/KentBeck/junit/issues#issue/44), so I imagine
> this will change soon.
>
> David Saff

That's good to know, also I see some great guys have already posted their patch for that. So can I assume that this feature will be supported in the next release?

My project hangs on this issue, so we have to stay on Junit3.8.1.....

Thanks and regards!
Tao
